name: UIDragItem
desc: A representation of an underlying data item being dragged from one location to another.

items.name: init(itemProvider: NSItemProvider)
items.desc: Initializes a new drag item with a specified item provider.

items.name: var itemProvider: NSItemProvider
items.desc: The item provider associated with the drag item.

items.name: var localObject: Any?
items.desc: A custom object associated with the drag item.

items.name: var previewProvider: (() -> UIDragPreview?)?
items.desc: A visual preview of the drag item, displayed while the user drags the item across the screen.
